Method Detail

finalize

public void finalize()
Overrides:
finalize in class SimulationProcess

Interrupt

public void Interrupt(SimulationEntity toInterrupt,
                      boolean immediate)
               throws SimulationException,
                      RestartException
Interrupt the given process (which *must* be in Wait or WaitFor), and resume it. If immediate resumption is required then this process will be suspended (placed back on to the scheduler queue for "immediate" resumption when the interrupted process has finished).

Throws:
SimulationException
RestartException

trigger

public final void trigger()

terminate

public void terminate()
Must wake up any waiting process before we "die". Currently only a single process can wait on this condition, but this may change to a list later.

Overrides:
terminate in class SimulationProcess

Wait

protected void Wait(double waitTime)
             throws SimulationException,
                    RestartException,
                    java.lang.InterruptedException
Wait for specified period of time. If this process is interrupted then the InterruptedException is thrown.

Throws:
SimulationException
RestartException
java.lang.InterruptedException

WaitFor

protected void WaitFor(SimulationEntity controller,
                       boolean reAct)
                throws SimulationException,
                       RestartException,
                       java.lang.InterruptedException
Suspends the current process until the process in the parameter has been terminated. If the calling process is interrupted before the 'controller' is terminated, then the InterruptedException is thrown. If the boolean parameter is true then the controller is reactivated immediately.

Throws:
SimulationException
RestartException
java.lang.InterruptedException

WaitFor

protected void WaitFor(SimulationEntity controller)
                throws SimulationException,
                       RestartException,
                       java.lang.InterruptedException
Suspends the current process until the process in the parameter has been terminated. If the calling process is interrupted before the 'controller' is terminated, then the InterruptedException is thrown. The controller will not be reactivated immediately.

Throws:
SimulationException
RestartException
java.lang.InterruptedException

WaitForTrigger

protected void WaitForTrigger(TriggerQueue _queue)
                       throws SimulationException,
                              RestartException,
                              java.lang.InterruptedException
The calling process is placed onto the trigger queue and should only be restarted pending some application specific event which uses the trigger queue. The InterruptedException is thrown if the caller is interrupted rather than being triggered.

Throws:
SimulationException
RestartException
java.lang.InterruptedException

WaitForSemaphore

protected void WaitForSemaphore(Semaphore _sem)
                         throws RestartException
Currently, a process which is waiting on a semaphore cannot be interrupted - its wait status is not set.

Throws:
RestartException
